name.en: Saffira, the Voiceless Voice Deity of Dragons
name.ja: <ruby>粛<rt>しゅく</rt></ruby><ruby>声<rt>せい</rt></ruby>なる<ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby>サフィラ

text.en: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Voiceless Voice Blessing". If this card is Ritual Summoned and you have "Lo, the Prayers of the Voiceless Voice" on your field or GY: You can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. When an attack is declared involving a LIGHT Ritual Monster (Warrior or Dragon): You can discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand. During your opponent's End Phase: You can add 1 LIGHT monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Saffira, the Voiceless Voice Deity of Dragons" once per turn.
